column4: Hmm.. clean install.. installed nvidia drivers.. message pops up 'failed to initilze HAL' - what the heck is Hal? :P
hardware abstraction layer, not sure what it means wrt nvidia
there is the generic term and then there is also a hal daemon used by project utopia stuff
not sure if its video related/gnomerelated.. or it may of poped up just as i plugged in my USB thumb dfrive. :p
